mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(DATEDIFF(DATE(NOW()), DATE(m.RGST_DT)) + 1, 0) AS DAYS_FROM_REGISTRATION, COALESCE(SUM(s.AMOUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT, NULL AS BADGE_RESPONSE_LIST FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN SAVING s ON m.MEMBER_ID = s.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND s.IS_DELETE = 'N' GROUP BY m.MEMBER_ID, m.RGST_DT UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS DAYS_FROM_REGISTRATION, 0 AS TOTAL_AMOUNT, NULL AS BADGE_RESPONSE_LIST WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN SAVING s ON m.MEMBER_ID = s.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND s.IS_DELETE = 'N' GROUP BY m.MEMBER_ID, m.RGST_DT )
